name: Stickman Hero (PlayDate)
description:
Stickman Hero  is another fun and addicting game. Crank to stretch the stick 

in order to reach the platforms and get to your FRIEND.

Watch out! If the stick is not long enough or too long, you will fall down!

Instructions
  • Crank Clockwise  to stretch the stick
  • Crank Counter-Clockwise to make it smaller
  • But take care, as soon as you stop the crank rotation the stick will start rotating! 

Increasing Difficulty
  • More tricky obstacles will come with each level
Controls
  • Crank

To install the game on your Playdate, follow the directions on the official Playdate site.
